Quietly, Nightshift gets back into robot mode and with ninja skill, he snea=
ks up. Behind Elita and rubs her head gently.

" Gotchya.  Nice try though.=
 "

As he interacts with her, a drop of condensation falls on his right sho=
ulder.  He looks up to the ceiling and then back to Elita.

" I got a neat =
trick ta show ya.  And I'm gonna teach it ta you'n your folks. Now, stay ri=
ght there, hold out your paws, pads up, and watch carefully."

He gently po=
sitions Elita's paws, steps back with a peaceful smile on his face, closes =
his eyes, and with a tranquil breath, slides his right foot across the floo=
r, starting from his left side, all the way to his right, in a semi circle.=
  

Another drop of condensation collects on the ceiling and forms another =
ball of moisture, which drips down from above.  Below it, Nightshift perfor=
ms a poetic version of Tai Chi, and while going through one of the paces, t=
he water drop gently rolls down onto his arm without splattering and contin=
ues to stay intact as he moves with a peaceful grace and fluidity.  At the =
end of the performance, the water drop is caught on the top of his hand as =
he manages to deposit it intact, into Elita's  paws.

" And there ya have i=
t.  Master Yokitron called this Inner Peace.  One can only find inner peace=
 within themselves once they learn how ta accept and recover from the demon=
s of their past.   I'm gonna teach you guys so many neat tricks, you're gon=
na make enemy heads spin clear off their body shells."

Perpetually on the =
move and constantly busy.
